title: Bug 6125 - JAR packager reports open files very late
description: When I try to create a JAR file by pressing the 'finish' button, the JAR creation fails and I receive the error message 'JAR creation failed: Unsaved Editors'.
OB: I am unable to create a JAR file with unsaved editors.
EB: I expect to be able to save the unsaved editors without exiting the wizard. If saving is not allowed, there should be a dialog prompting me to save the unsaved editors before proceeding with the JAR creation.
SR:
1. Open the JAR packager wizard.
2. Enter all the required information.
3. Leave some editors unsaved.
4. Click on the 'finish' button to create the JAR file.
Result: The JAR creation fails and the error message 'JAR creation failed: Unsaved Editors' is displayed.
